title: Party to Murder
description: Sir Digby Kirtling, self-made millionaire and would-be member of the landed gentry, has commissioned talented artist Philip Montwell to copy an impressionist painting. During the unveiling party, celebration turns to tragedy when his estate manager, Una May, is found dead, strangled with her own gold neck-chain. Sir Digby quickly becomes the prime suspect and Sukey Reynolds, Crime Scene Investigator, is reluctantly drawn into an attempt by his housekeeper to prove his innocence.
author: Betty Rowlands
